ANA MARIA SALAZAR (Former Deputy Assistant Secretary of Defense)): In drafting this law, they were trying to figure out a way to provide more definition in order to avoid some inequalities and corruption problems, because the current Mexican law allows those who are drug addicts to not be prosecuted.
